```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
hla_allele <- hla_info[, 1:6]

hla_count <- table(unlist(apply(hla_allele, 1, unique)))

hla_count <- as.data.frame(hla_count)
colnames(hla_count) <- c("hla", "count")

hla_count <- hla_count[order(-hla_count$count), ]
```

```{r}
hla_count_5 <- hla_count[hla_count$count > 4,]
hla_count_5$hla <- paste0("HLA-", hla_count_5$hla)
hla_count_5 <- hla_count_5[hla_count_5$hla %in% HLA_I_pseudo_40$hla,]
```
